meta.content: Katherine Anne Porter is a tuition-free public charter school serving Wimberley, Dripping Springs, San Marcos, New Braunfels and Canyon Lake for grades 8-12. We offer rolling admissions so apply today!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

li.p: View a snapshot of a day in the life of students at Katherine Anne Porter School
Learn about our admissions process and details on how to enroll
Familiarize yourself with fast facts and more information about our student body
Take a look at a map with our area served including Wimberley, Blanco, Dripping Springs, Canyon Lake, San Marcos, New Braunfels, and South Austin
Go back into our history including learning about our namesake, Katherine Anne Porter

div.p: Katherine Anne Porter School offers fine arts classes like music, art and theatre, but we are more about offering creativity as the conduit to high-level learning in all classes. Our core content teachers strive to foster creativity in each student as they approach English, mathematics, science and social studies.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: We do not feel students should switch from right-brain to left-brain when exposed to knowledge and skills so important to academic achievement; we believe they should engage the entire brain as they become life-long learners where every moment is an opportunity to learn. And, we don’t just believe it; we practice it!

figure.blockquote: Every student, every subject, every day, no excuses, no exceptions.
